document_data.name: Queen's Fury
document_data.mainbody: The '''Queen's Fury''' was the pirate vessel of [[Catharyn]] of [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Description: The flag of Queen's Fury was a dolphin jumping over a ship. The sight of this flag struck terror into the hearts of any ship on the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Activities: The Queen's Fury was sailed from Dambrath across the Great Sea to raid as far west as [[Nimbral]] on the [[Trackless Sea]].
